name: Path
short_description: Path is a mobile photo-sharing and messaging service for building personal social networks with up to 150 contacts.
overview:
Path brings people closer together. Guided by the belief that mobile technology will fundamentally change the cultural, social, and economic landscape, Path focuses on simplicity, quality, and privacy to provide the best mobile personal networking service in the world. Path was designed with the people you love, your closest friends and family, in mind. It's a trusted, intimate environment like your dinner table at home. 5 star rated, top 10 ranked, Path is loved by tens of millions of people around the world.
Founded by [Dave Morin](http://www.crunchbase.com/person/dave-morin), previously Co-Creator of Platform and Connect at [Facebook](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/facebook), with [Shawn Fanning](http://www.crunchbase.com/person/shawn-fanning), Creator of [Napster](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/napster), and Dustin Mierau, Co-Creator of Macster.
